definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: I'm seriously considering joining a monastry and taking holy orders .
sentences.chinese: 我正在慎重地考慮進修道院當修道士。

sentences.english: There is a monastery where the monks live in sin with women lovers.
sentences.chinese: 在一個修道院裏住着那些犯了色戒的修道士。

sentences.english: The flattery monacal is a philatelic.
sentences.chinese: 那個阿諛的修道士是個集郵愛好者。

sentences.english: I have a feeling you've been feeding me a line of shite about the Monk.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺你好像給了我一條有關修道士的假消息。

sentences.english: The first monk smiled and asid nothing .
sentences.chinese: 第一個修道士仍然微笑不語。
五個胖的男修道士在煎比目魚。

sentences.english: The elephant sneezed and fell on his knees, and that was the end of the monk.
sentences.chinese: 象打噴嚏而且落在他的膝，而且那是修道士的結束。

sentences.english: He's not bad-looking, for a monk.
sentences.chinese: 他不難看，對一個修道士來說。

sentences.english: You have found the man and gotten vengeance for the dead monks.
sentences.chinese: 你找到了那個刺客併爲那些死去的修道士們報了仇。

sentences.english: Purity is an idea for the yogi or the monk.
sentences.chinese: 純潔是屬於瑜伽士或修道士的觀念。

sentences.english: It’s a Belgium beer brewed by monks who absolutely fascinate me.
sentences.chinese: 一些修道士釀造的比利時啤酒深深地吸引了我。

sentences.english: Zen monks will go so far as to hit you with a stick.
sentences.chinese: 禪宗修道士會走這麼遠來用棍子打你。

sentences.english: It is proposed by the Italian monk St Francis in 12th century.
sentences.chinese: 它是由意大利修道士聖弗蘭西斯在十二世紀提出的。
等候一列火車的修道士。

sentences.english: All the monks in the church are quite loyal.
sentences.chinese: 教堂裏的修道士都很虔心。

sentences.english: Mount Athos monks were once recruited from farming backgrounds.
sentences.chinese: 阿索斯山的修道士們一度是從務農的人中招募的。

definition: nun or sister (of the Roman Catholic or Greek Orthodox churches)
